thread.title: BRIEF-SJW Group Says CPUC Issued Proposed Decision On San Jose Water Co's Cost Of Capital For 2018-2020

title: BRIEF-SJW Group Says CPUC Issued Proposed Decision On San Jose Water Co's Cost Of Capital For 2018-2020

organizations.name: cpuc issued proposed decision on san jose water co

text:
22 AM / in 7 minutes BRIEF-SJW Group Says CPUC Issued Proposed Decision On San Jose Water Co's Cost Of Capital For 2018-2020 Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
Feb 9 (Reuters) - SJW Group: 
* SJW GROUP SAYS ON FEB 6 CALIFORNIA PUBLIC UTILITIES COMMISSION ISSUED A PROPOSED DECISION REGARDING SAN JOSE WATER COâ€˜S COST OF CAPITAL FOR 2018-2020 
* SJW - PROPOSED DECISION REDUCES SAN JOSE WATER COMPANY'S RETURN ON EQUITY FROM 9.43% TO 8.30% & OVERALL RETURN ON RATE BASE FROM 8.09% TO 7.19% Source text : ( bit.ly/2FZZIT6 )
